comments:
2 scenarios gnerate errors and exceptions:

A. Migrate a lib with old format then upgrade content with a lib with the new format
1. open old lib lib in EPF 1.0
2. import->library configuration and select a lib with new format
results-> get multiple interactive exceptions. User has to click OK 10+ times
"
An error has occurred. Click Details for more information.
  java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.epf.authoring.ui.views.LibraryView$13.run(LibraryView.java:1885)
	at org.eclipse.epf.library.edit.ui.UserInteractionHelper$6.run(UserInteractionHelper.java:507)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:113)
"

B. Open a lib with new format then upgrade content with the same lib (copied to a diff location)
1. open EPF wth a lib in the new format
2. import->library configuration and select a lib with new format
results=> get error message dialog "...import configuration failed ..."
both senarios are fine now, verified on build 1020
